full_summary:
### Statistics Canada Security Equipment Installation and Maintenance Service Contract
#### RFx/Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** J069633
* **Reference Number:** cb-453-13913985
* **Amendment Number:** 09
* **Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 30, 2024 2:00 pm EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Tender Status:** Expired
#### Intended Use
This RFx seeks a single contractor to provide security equipment installation and maintenance services for Statistics Canada.
#### Goods and Services
The contract shall cover the installation of new security equipment, as well as the maintenance, repair, and upgrading of current security hardware and software.
#### Options to Extend Contract
The contract extends for one (1) year, with the option to extend by up to four (4) additional periods of one (1) year each.
#### Contracting Entity Details
* **Contracting Entity:** Statistics Canada
* **Address:** 150 Tunney's Pasture Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0T6, Canada
* **Contact Name:** Abbas Khokhar
* **Contact Email:** [abbar.khohar@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:abbar.khohar@statcan.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone Number:** 343 548 1422
#### Electronic Documents
The following electronic documents are available for download:

* [rfp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25553/en-rfp.pdf)
* [rfp_fra.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25553/fr-rfp.pdf)

#### Important Information
This RFx is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) and other trade agreements.
This RFx is conditionally set aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received by Indigenous businesses.
Bidders are required to express interest in the RFx by sending an email to [statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@stat
